name: KlepterSpecter
description: My submission for Trijam 202. It was my first Game Jam so I ran out of time quick. I may go back and finish this, but this is where I got in 3 hours. I just ran out of time to complete it, and even if I stayed up to do more I have work in the morning. Still, was fun to give this a shot! Will definitly have to do this again
